changeSet.author: dmi@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Fill ids of Ledger Account at DepositAccount
changeSet.sql: update deposit_account set linked_accounts = (select id from ledger_account where ledger_account.name = deposit_account.iban)

changeSet.author: dmi@adorsys.com.ua
changeSet.comment: Add column currency to Account Accesses anf fix values
changeSet.sql: update account_accesses set currency = (select currency from deposit_account where deposit_account.iban = account_accesses.iban)
